item.title: High Bandwidth Dissimilar Line Bonding From Mushroom Networks
item.description:
Want to create your own high-bandwidth internet connection without the exorbitant cost of dedicated services like SONET OC3? Combining consumer-grade options like DSL, cable, or wireless might seem appealing, but achieving a reliable, high-speed connection this way is practically impossible with standard routers. Instead of another router, consider the Truffles appliance from Mushroom Networks. This innovative device combines multiple internet connections, regardless of type, into a single, high-bandwidth connection. While traditional “T1 bonding” offered by carriers has limitations in terms of speed and requiring identical lines from a single provider, Truffles takes a different approach...

item.title: Combine T1 Lines For Higher Speed
item.description:
T1 lines have been a popular choice for small and medium-sized businesses for many years due to their reliability, security, dedicated bandwidth, and accessibility. While their affordability has increased in recent years, their speed has remained a limitation. However, there’s a solution to overcome this without sacrificing the benefits of T1 technology: bonding. Bonding is a standard industry technique that allows you to combine the bandwidth of multiple T1 lines. This effectively merges them into a single, faster connection...
